<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_323515_account_0_ru_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_323515_account_0_ru_task">state=2^EQ<item display_value="Work in Progress" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="2"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Move Ru task state to complete</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sysapproval_approver");
	gr.addQuery(gr.document_id ,current.sys_id);
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()){
		if(gr.state == "approved"){
			current.state = '3';
		}
		else if(gr.state == 'rejected'){
			current.state = '1';
			current.fiscal_year = '';
			current.get_data_from_cmdb = '';
			current.current_month_count = '';
			current.variance_explanation = '';
			current.update();
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-26 17:44:27</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>619b238997e53110e25972d6f053af90</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Move Ru task state to complete</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Account Financials" source="x_323515_account_0">571aa98d975c3110e25972d6f053af59</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Account Financials">571aa98d975c3110e25972d6f053af59</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_619b238997e53110e25972d6f053af90</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-26 17:55:13</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=619b238997e53110e25972d6f053af90"/></record_update>
